document.full_text: u.s. authorities are facing a huge backlog of records involving people who have stayed in the united states after their visas expired, according to a report released on tuesday, revealing that a security gap has not been fixed since the september 11, 2001 attacks.
document.title: officials face big visa overstay record backlog
lines_and_colors: u.s. authorities are facing a huge backlog of records involving people who have stayed in the united states after their visas expired, according to a report released on tuesday, revealing that a security gap has not been fixed since the september 11, 2001 attacks.
